questions.question: Which command is used to create a new Django project?
What is a Django model?
options: A Python class that represents a database table
questions.answer: A Python class that represents a database table

questions.question: Which command is used to apply database migrations in Django?
What is the purpose of Django's MTV architecture?
options: Model Template View - separates the logic of an application
Model Test View - handles testing in Django
Main Template View - manages the main application flow
Model Type View - defines data types in Django
questions.answer: Model Template View - separates the logic of an application
